title: The Curious Case of the Scientist and the Bimbo
description: To save her relationship with Ryan, overweight scientist Candice creates a serum that transforms her into a completely big-titted, bronze-skinned bimbo. But she can't stop taking it, and her bimbo self has caught the attention of Richter, a ruthless billionaire who will stop at nothing to make her his personal bimbo babe slave...this erotic novella features several intensely sexual scenes.
author: Nadia Nightside
